Tara is famous. Do you want to be famous? What will happen when you become famous?
You will be interviewed. Let's interview each other.
Read the options given below. Click on Answer This to choose one of the following options.
You meet a famous cricketer for the first time. Ask him/her a few questions.
You are a T.V. interviewer. You are going to ask questions to a famous dancer.
You are a T.V. interviewer. Your friend is a scientist. Ask him/her a few questions.
